title: New: Voyager – Midnight Fang
body:
Since Introducing **Voyager** amidst the dying embers of 2012, it’s clear that the Atlanta based group aren’t merely a one-hit wonder and have plenty more tricks up their billowing sleeves.

New gem and EP closer _Dawn_ picks up where their previous outings left off, with an intoxicating mix of **The XX** and **Youth Lagoon**, spurred on by warped folk-pop mystic. Also, as well as uploading this final track from the EP, the group have also made the full release, title **_Midnight Fang_**, available to download via a name your price deal over at their [bandcamp](http://voyaging.bandcamp.com/album/midnight-fang).

\[soundcloud url=”http://api.soundcloud.com/tracks/73636233″ params=”” width=” 100%” height=”166″ iframe=”true” /\]
